title: Drag and Drop Basic
description: Checks if the dragged item matches the correct target, and sets feedback.
use_case: Simple knowledge check using drag and drop.
storyline_instructions: Add as a JavaScript trigger on Submit.

variables.name: DraggedItem
variables.description: Name or value of the dropped item.

variables.name: Feedback
variables.description: Text to display as feedback to the learner.

notes: Update the value 'CorrectTarget' to your target's variable value.
